com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.plan.strategy

Interface Strategy<C extends Element>

  • Type Parameters:
    C - is the type of child Elements to which the Strategy applies.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Interruptible
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CanaryStrategy, DependencyStrategy, InterruptibleStrategy, ParallelStrategy, RandomStrategy, SerialStrategy

    public interface Strategy<C extends Element>
extends Interruptible
    A strategy indicates which child Elements are ready to be processed. It may be interrupted such that it will indicate that no elements are available for processing. To resume normal operation Interruptible.proceed() may be called.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Collection<C> getCandidates(java.util.Collection<C> elements, java.util.Collection<PodInstanceRequirement> dirtyAssets)
      Returns the candidate element(s), if any, which may have work performed against them.
      java.lang.String getName() 

      • Methods inherited from interface com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.plan.Interruptible

        interrupt, isInterrupted, proceed

    • Method Detail

      • getCandidates

        java.util.Collection<C> getCandidates(java.util.Collection<C> elements,
                                      java.util.Collection<PodInstanceRequirement> dirtyAssets)
        Returns the candidate element(s), if any, which may have work performed against them.
        Parameters:
        elements - the elements to be examined for candidacy
        dirtyAssets - any asset names which already have work in progress elsewhere, which should not be returned by this call
        Returns:
        zero or more candidates for work to be performed

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
